2082.subject: CST
2082.descrlong: This course uses a project-based approach for creating graphics in digital format and exploring the aesthetics of electronic publishing. Topics will include typography, layout, proportion, and color theory. (Offered only as interest warrants.)

2134.subject: CST
2134.descrlong: This project-based course combines the study of visual design and aesthetic principles while developing skills to produce digital graphic media. Students study historic design trends, typography, color theory, and production for cross-media production. Students apply the steps of the Design Process to create original vector and bitmapped imagery to solve visual communication design problems. (Credit/No Credit Available)
